basic_node.title: Inner scattering by pores in object part material
basic_node.description: Internal scattering of transmitted beam by pores in object part material, generally referred as bulk scatter.
basic_node.references: [sp46, http://aip.scitation.org/doi/10.1063/1.1662961] [sp47, https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/8500511/, Mutual influence of absorption; reflection and transmission: A + R + T = 1 with absorption coefficient A; reflection coefficient R; transmission coefficient T. Thus; causes for one of these three inevitably affect the other two.] [sp47, https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S0924271612000378, Mutual influence of absorption; reflection and transmission: A + R + T = 1 with absorption coefficient A; reflection coefficient R; transmission coefficient T. Thus; causes for one of these three inevitably affect the other two.
